mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.f_code, f.f_date, f.f_redate, f.f_sum, f.f_pname, f.f_spname, f.f_ppath, f.f_psize, f.f_content, f.f_ck, f.f_num, f.s_id, cs.cates_code, cs.cates_name, cm.catemm_name, c.catem_name FROM flea f, cate_sub cs, cate_mid cm, cate_main c WHERE f.s_id = #{s_id} AND f.cates_code = cs.cates_code AND cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code AND cm.catem_code = c.catem_code ORDER BY f.f_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT f.f_code, f.f_date, f.f_redate, f.f_sum, f.f_pname, f.f_spname, f.f_ppath, f.f_psize, f.f_content, f.f_ck, f.f_num, f.s_id, cs.cates_code, cs.cates_name, cm.catemm_name, c.catem_name FROM flea f, cate_sub cs, cate_mid cm, cate_main c WHERE f_code = #{f_code} AND f.cates_code = cs.cates_code AND cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code AND cm.catem_code = c.catem_code
